job_tasks.phrase: Understand how to technically scale the services in the 'employee experience platform', which empowers the "@AH app".
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of how technical solutions relate to the functionality and purpose of a specific product ('employee experience platform') and its integration with a larger application ('@AH app').

job_tasks.phrase: Understand how to combine best agile development practices in combination with a services-based architecture.
job_tasks.justification: This shows an understanding of project methodologies (agile) and architectural patterns within a business context.

job_tasks.phrase: This initiative, building an employee app for your own colleagues, is a priority project for Albert Heijn, with the potential of scaling to other brands within Ahold Delhaize.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights an awareness of the project's importance, its target users (employees/colleagues), and its potential for broader business impact and scaling across different brands.

job_tasks.phrase: develop new features using the latest technology.
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct statement about the core activity of creating new functionalities, which is a fundamental software development task.
This is a fundamental and explicit description of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: develop a feature-rich product for our employees, guided by a senior developer.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the development of a product with features, a core software development activity, also indicating collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Are knowledgeable of your domain (Kotlin back-end services on our Azure Kubernetes platform), though you can also liaise with other engineers and their respective technologies (Front and Back End).
job_tasks.justification: This describes knowledge and interaction related to backend services and liaising with other engineering disciplines, integral to software development.

job_tasks.phrase: keeping up the high security and coding standards of the platform.
job_tasks.justification: Maintaining coding standards and security are operational aspects of ensuring software quality and reliability.
Enforcing code quality is part of maintaining operational standards for software.
Developing best practices relates to establishing efficient and reliable operational processes.
Writing tests is crucial for the operational aspect of ensuring software reliability and functionality.

job_tasks.phrase: manage the continuous integration of code.
job_tasks.justification: Continuous integration is a core MLOps/DevOps practice for automating code integration and testing.
Test automation is a key component of CI/CD and MLOps.
IT security is an operational concern for production systems.

job_tasks.phrase: using Azure and Microservices, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines.
job_tasks.justification: Mentioning specific technologies like Kubernetes and CI/CD pipelines directly points to operations and infrastructure management.
Release engineering automation is directly related to the operational processes of deploying software.

job_tasks.phrase: we use Azure DevOps and Github Actions
job_tasks.justification: These are specific tools used for CI/CD and release management, fitting within operations.

soft_skills.phrase: liaise with other engineers and their respective technologies
Understand how to technically scale the services
Opportunity to learn more about test automation, IT security
you help with the realization of new features.
You contribute by keeping up the high security and coding standards of the platform.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional software development, CI/CD, MLOps (operations engineering), and business understanding. There is no mention of Generative AI specific tasks like prompt engineering, RAG, fine-tuning LLMs, or building applications on top of generative models. Therefore, it does not fit the GenAI Engineer profile.
